Content: I'm relatively a newbie into motorcycles.Going into my second year in September 2024.I'm 54 years young and all I want to do is ride all the time.I'm so drawn to cruisers do to their styling.I do like Baggers and Sport bikes as well.I'm not a Brand loyalists of any kind.If it catches my eye and it looks the part then so be it.I live in South Ga. and the riding seasons never really end here.I'm definitely going to be adding some more to my stable.I'm glad to be a part of this community and hopefully I'll meet some great people on here.My beginner bike 2010 honda Stateline and my Beast a 2014 Valkyrie with ABS!

Title: My new Passion in life after 50!
Author: Mingo04
